automotive_papers.title: Leveraging Vision-Language Models for Visual Grounding and Analysis of Automotive UI
automotive_papers.key_focus: Fine-tuning vision-language models for UI understanding, visual grounding, and evaluation in automotive infotainment systems
automotive_papers.best_for: Automated HMI testing, infotainment validation, synthetic data generation, and domain-specific vision-language model adaptation

automotive_papers.title: Generative AI for Autonomous Driving: A Review
automotive_papers.key_focus: Survey of generative models (VAEs, GANs, diffusion, transformers) and their applications in Autonomous Driving: scenario generation, mapping, motion prediction, planning, and end-to-end driving.
automotive_papers.best_for: Exploring GenAI’s role in autonomous driving, synthetic data, motion forecasting, world models, and safety-critical generative systems.

automotive_papers.title: Enhanced Drift-Aware Computer Vision Architecture for Autonomous Driving
automotive_papers.key_focus: Hybrid YOLOv8 + CNN framework trained on synthetic drifted CARLA data to improve robustness against data drift in real-time perception.
automotive_papers.best_for: Addressing robustness, safety, and reliability of Computer Vision pipelines under distribution shift, adverse weather, and sensor drift.

automotive_papers.title: Gen AI in Automotive: Applications, Challenges, and Opportunities with a Case study on In-Vehicle Experience
automotive_papers.key_focus: Exploration of generative AI technologies (GANs, VAEs, LLMs) across automotive domains—design, manufacturing, autonomous driving and in-vehicle UX—plus a case study on voice assistant evolution.
automotive_papers.best_for: Understanding how generative AI can shape vehicle user experience, system validation, and lifecycle processes in mobility.

automotive_papers.title: A Benchmarking Framework for AI models in Automotive Aerodynamics
automotive_papers.key_focus: Standardised evaluation of AI/ML models in automotive external aerodynamics (flow prediction, surface & volumetric fields) within computer-aided engineering context.
automotive_papers.best_for: Developing or selecting AI models for Computational Fluid Dynamics workflows in automotive design and aerodynamic optimisation.

automotive_papers.title: Embedded Acoustic Intelligence for Automotive Systems
automotive_papers.key_focus: Use of in-vehicle acoustic signatures and deep learning for road-type classification, Autonomous driving/Advanced Driver Assistance Systems perception enhancement, and active noise control.
automotive_papers.best_for: Working on sensor fusion, acoustic signal processing, vehicle environment perception, and comfort/noise-management systems.

automotive_papers.title: Automating Automotive Software Development: A Synergy of Generative AI and Formal Methods
automotive_papers.key_focus: Integration of generative AI and formal verification to accelerate safe, correct automotive software development for software-defined vehicles (SDV).
automotive_papers.best_for: Automotive software architects, safety engineers, and SDV product teams using AI for requirements, code generation, and verification.

automotive_papers.title: AI Agents in Engineering Design: A Multi-Agent Framework for Aesthetic and Aerodynamic Car Design
automotive_papers.key_focus: A multi-agent generative design system that jointly optimises aesthetic and aerodynamic properties through collaborative agent reasoning.
automotive_papers.best_for: Automotive design engineers, Computer-Aided Design/Computer-Aided Engineering teams, and R&D groups exploring multi-objective generative design or multi-agent co-creation.

automotive_papers.title: DRIVE: Disfluency-Rich Synthetic Dialog Data Generation Framework for Intelligent Vehicle Environments
automotive_papers.key_focus: Synthetic generation of realistic, disfluency-rich dialog datasets to train conversational and voice-assistant systems in vehicles.
automotive_papers.best_for: Developing in-vehicle conversational AI, infotainment voice interfaces, and data generation pipelines for speech systems.

automotive_papers.title: Automotive Software and Electronics 2030
automotive_papers.key_focus: Projected growth and structural shifts in the automotive software & electrical/electronic (E/E) market driven by ACES (autonomous, connected, electrified, shared) trends and E/E-architecture evolution.
automotive_papers.best_for: Strategically navigating the software-defined vehicle transition and changing value chain dynamics.
